Title: DFT study of molecular structures and relative stabilities of 1,2,7-thiadiazepane 1,1-dioxide and 1,2,7-thiadiazepane 1-oxide
Abstract: © 2016, Springer Science+Business Media New York.The structures and energies of 1,2,7-thiadiazepane 1,1-dioxide and the axial and equatorial conformers of 1,2,7-thiadiazepane 1-oxide were calculated using the hybrid density functional B3LYP with the cc-pVDZ basis set. The results obtained explain the lower stabilities of equatorial conformers compared to the axial analogs and the lower stabilities of sulfones compared to sulfoxides.
